mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.amount, o.per_amount as perAmount, o.comment, o.pay_datetime as payDatetime, o.style_id as styleId, o.payer_userid as payerUserId, o.creator_id as creatorId, u.nickname as payerName, COALESCE(psi.display_name, ps.style_name) as styleName FROM outcome o LEFT JOIN user u ON o.payer_userid = u.id LEFT JOIN pay_style ps ON o.style_id = ps.id LEFT JOIN pay_style_i18n psi ON ps.id = psi.style_id AND psi.language = #{language} WHERE o.activity_id = #{activityId} AND o.deleted_flag = 0 AND o.repay_flag = 1 ORDER BY o.pay_datetime DESC
